metadata.projectGoal: 基于 ai/tasks 创建一个资产管理系统

database.notes: SQLite for dev/test/small deployments, MySQL for production/scale

search.assets.query.description:
Provide paginated asset list with filter/sort by type, owner, status, tags, and updated time.
> 提供分页资产列表，支持按类型、归属、状态、标签与更新时间筛选/排序。

audit.events.record.description:
Record an audit event for every asset create/update/archive and for admin permission changes.
> 对每次资产创建/更新/归档以及管理员权限变更记录审计事件。

aiTasks.definitions.load.description:
Load AI task definitions from an ai/tasks directory (YAML/JSON) with schema validation and versioning.
> 从 ai/tasks 目录加载 AI 任务定义（YAML/JSON），支持结构校验与版本管理。

ui.assets.dashboard.description:
Build a web UI for asset list/detail/edit flows with role-aware navigation.
> 构建资产列表/详情/编辑流程的 Web UI，并根据角色控制导航与权限。

platform.repo.bootstrap.description: Create a pnpm workspace with consistent scripts (dev/build/test) and TypeScript base config.

tests.coverage.smoke.description:
Add unit and integration tests covering asset CRUD, RBAC enforcement, and AI task state transitions.
> 添加覆盖资产 CRUD、RBAC 权限控制与 AI 任务状态流转的单元/集成测试。

api.http.errors.description: Implement a consistent API error format (status, code, message, requestId) across all endpoints.

db.schema.assets.description: Define database schema for assets (name, type, tags, owner, status, timestamps) with migrations.

auth.user.register.description: Implement user registration with password hashing and input validation.

assets.asset.read.description: Fetch an asset by id with authorization checks and consistent error responses.

web.assets.crud.description: Build web pages to create, view, edit, and list assets using the API.

config.env.validate.description: Load configuration from environment variables and fail fast on missing/invalid values.

core.code-generator.description: Implement asset code generation with configurable rules and concurrency handling

core.state-machine.description: Implement unified asset state machine with transition validation

core.data-permission.description: Implement project-based data permission extending RuoYi DataScope

core.project-init.description: Initialize RuoYi-Vue project with ruoyi-asset module skeleton

core.asset-entity.description: Create base Asset entity, enums, VOs, and DTOs

house.entity.description: Create house asset entity with extension fields for area, type, rental info

core.dictionary-setup.description: Configure system dictionaries for all asset types and statuses

house.detail.description: Implement house asset detail view with maintenance history and attachments

house.statistics.description: Implement house asset statistics (vacancy rate, usage breakdown)

core.attachment-service.description: Implement attachment upload/download service for assets and orders

house.create.description: Implement house asset creation with auto-generated asset code

parking.crud.description: Implement full CRUD for parking assets

observability.logging.request.description: Add structured request logging with correlation IDs and redaction of sensitive fields.

docs.api.openapi.description: Publish API documentation (OpenAPI spec) and provide local instructions to run the stack.

parking.entity.description: Create parking asset entity with zone, type, rental info

facility.entity.description: Create facility asset entity with equipment and vendor info

core.database-schema.description: Create database schema for all asset tables and maintenance tables

venue.crud.description: Implement full CRUD for venue assets

office.entity.description: Create office asset entity with IT equipment fields

maintenance.order-entity.description: Create maintenance work order entity with status enum

office.crud.description: Implement full CRUD for office assets

maintenance.order-list.description: Implement order list with role-based filtering

maintenance.order-log.description: Create order log entity for workflow audit trail

maintenance.order-workflow.description: Implement order status workflow with asset status integration

maintenance.order-create.description: Implement order creation from asset or independently

maintenance.order-detail.description: Implement order detail with timeline and workflow actions

maintenance.asset-history.description: Implement maintenance history view for assets

dashboard.management-home.description: Implement management dashboard with key metrics and charts

dashboard.operations-home.description: Implement operations staff dashboard with pending tasks

db.schema.users.description: Define users/roles tables to support authentication and authorization.

parking.statistics.description: Implement parking utilization statistics by zone

house.update.description: Implement house asset update with change logging and state machine integration

auth.rbac.enforce.description: Enforce role-based access control for protected routes (e.g., admin vs. regular user).

auth.user.login.description: Implement login that issues a secure session/JWT and returns current user profile.

house.list.description: Implement house asset list with search, filter, and pagination

venue.entity.description: Create venue asset entity with capacity and availability info

assets.asset.delete.description: Soft-delete an asset and prevent it from appearing in default listings.

assets.asset.create.description: Create an asset with server-side validation and persist it to the database.

assets.asset.search.description: List/search assets with pagination, filters (type/status/tags), and sort order.

observability.health.readiness.description: Expose health/readiness endpoints that verify DB connectivity and essential dependencies.

platform.testing.contract.description: Add unit/integration test scaffolding and a minimal CI-ready test command.

files.attachment.upload.description: Upload and attach a file to an asset, storing metadata and enforcing size/type limits.

assets.asset.update.description: Update editable asset fields with optimistic concurrency control (updatedAt/version).

facility.crud.description: Implement full CRUD for facility assets with warranty tracking

dashboard.asset-manager-home.description: Implement asset manager dashboard with data quality alerts

files.attachment.download.description: Download an asset attachment with authorization and audit logging.

assets.asset.archive.description:
Archive or deactivate assets with a reversible state transition and recorded reason.
> 支持资产归档/停用，具备可逆的状态流转并记录原因。

db.schema.bootstrap.description:
Define initial database schema for users, roles, assets, tags, attachments, AI tasks, and audit logs.
> 定义初始数据库结构：用户、角色、资产、标签、附件、AI 任务与审计日志。

web.auth.session.description: Implement login/logout flows in the web UI and persist session state securely.

aiTasks.jobs.enqueue.description:
Create AI task runs for selected assets (manual trigger and rules-based trigger) and persist job state.
> 为选定资产创建 AI 任务运行（手动触发与规则触发），并持久化任务状态。

aiTasks.results.apply.description:
Apply AI task results to asset fields (e.g., auto-tagging, description generation) with human review option.
> 将 AI 任务结果应用到资产字段（如自动打标、生成描述），并提供人工审核选项。

api.rest.assets.description:
Expose REST endpoints for asset CRUD, attachments, tags, and AI task triggers with request validation.
> 提供资产增删改查、附件、标签与 AI 任务触发的 REST 接口，并做请求校验。

observability.errors.standardize.description:
Standardize error codes and responses across API/UI, and add structured logs for key workflows.
> 统一 API/UI 的错误码与响应格式，并为关键流程加入结构化日志。

assets.tags.manage.description:
Add/remove tags and categories for assets, and ensure tag uniqueness and normalization.
> 为资产添加/移除标签与分类，并保证标签唯一性与规范化。

aiTasks.worker.execute.description:
Implement a worker that executes AI tasks with retries, timeouts, and idempotency keys.
> 实现执行 AI 任务的 Worker，支持重试、超时与幂等键。
